alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:24PM EDT until August 07 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bath County in east central Kentucky... Central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 124 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sherburne, or 10 miles northwest of Owingsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pebble around 130 PM EDT. Oakley around 135 PM EDT. Hillsboro around 140 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Plummers Landing and Muses Mills. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for east central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for east central Kentucky.
